name: Fine Print AI
subtitle: Legal Document Risk Analysis

description.short: Analyze legal documents for hidden risks with AI-powered privacy and terms analysis.
description.full:
Fine Print AI is your personal legal document analyzer that uses advanced AI to scan Terms of Service, Privacy Policies, EULAs, and other legal documents to identify potentially problematic clauses and hidden risks.

üîç SMART ANALYSIS
‚Ä¢ AI-powered pattern recognition identifies 50+ risk types
‚Ä¢ Instant risk scoring from 0-100%
‚Ä¢ Plain English explanations of complex legal terms
‚Ä¢ Automated detection of concerning clauses

üì± POWERFUL FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Document camera scanner with OCR
‚Ä¢ Offline analysis for privacy protection
‚Ä¢ Cross-device sync with end-to-end encryption
‚Ä¢ Widget for quick risk monitoring
‚Ä¢ Siri Shortcuts for voice commands
‚Ä¢ Share extension for analyzing documents from any app

üõ°Ô∏è PRIVACY FIRST
‚Ä¢ All processing happens locally on your device
‚Ä¢ No document content sent to servers
‚Ä¢ GDPR and CCPA compliant
‚Ä¢ Optional cloud sync with encryption

‚ö° KEY BENEFITS
‚Ä¢ Save time reading lengthy legal documents
‚Ä¢ Understand your digital rights and privacy
‚Ä¢ Make informed decisions about apps and services
‚Ä¢ Protect yourself from unfavorable terms
‚Ä¢ Track changes in updated policies

üéØ PERFECT FOR
‚Ä¢ Privacy-conscious users
‚Ä¢ Small business owners
‚Ä¢ Freelancers and contractors
‚Ä¢ Anyone who signs digital agreements
‚Ä¢ Legal professionals

Fine Print AI puts the power back in your hands. Know what you're agreeing to before you sign.
